00027 int compare(const integer &b1, const integer &b2, bool ignoresign) {
00028     if (!ignoresign) {
00029         int sign1=b1.sign(), sign2=b2.sign();
00030         if (sign1==0 && sign2==0) return 0;
00031         if (sign1==0) return -sign2;
00032         if (sign2==0) return sign1;
00033 
00034         if (sign1 != sign2) return sign1;
00035         if (sign1 < 0) return compare(-b2, -b1, ignoresign);
00036     }
00037 
00038     const detail::data_t *b1data=b1._get_data();
00039     const detail::data_t *b2data=b2._get_data();
00040 
00041     int answer=0;
00042     if (b1data->mLength != b2data->mLength) {
00043         answer=((b1data->mLength < b2data->mLength) ? -1 : 1);
00044     } else {
00045         for (int x = int(b1data->mLength) - 1; x >= 0; --x) {
00046             if (b1data->digits[x] != b2data->digits[x]) {
00047                 answer=((b1data->digits[x] < b2data->digits[x]) ? -1 : 1);
00048                 break;
00049             }
00050         }
00051     }
00052 
00053     return answer;
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool operator!(const integer &num1) { return num1.sign()==0; }
00057 bool operator==(const integer &num1, const integer &num2) {
00058     return compare(num1, num2)==0; }
00059 bool operator!=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00060     return compare(num1, num2)!=0; }
00061 bool operator<(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00062     return compare(num1, num2)<0; }
00063 bool operator>(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00064     return compare(num1, num2)>0; }
00065 bool operator<=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00066     return compare(num1, num2)<=0; }
00067 bool operator>=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00068     return compare(num1, num2)>=0; }

00070 } // namespace core
00071 
00086 int compare(const integer &b1, const integer &b2, bool ignoresign) {
00087     try {
00088         return compare(core::integer(b1), core::integer(b2));
00089     } catch (std::exception&) {
00090         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00091         else return 0;
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 namespace {
00096 template <typename T>
00097 bool cmp(const integer &num1, const integer &num2, const T& t) {
00098     try {
00099         return t(compare(core::integer(num1), core::integer(num2)), 0);
00100     } catch (std::exception&) {
00101         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00102         else return false;
00103     }
00104 }
00105 } // namespace
00106 
00107 bool operator!(const integer &num1) {
00108     try {
00109         return operator!(core::integer(num1));
00110     } catch (std::exception&) {
00111         if (exceptions_allowed()) throw;
00112         else return false;
00113     }
00114 }

00116 bool operator==(const integer &num1, const integer &num2) {
00117     return cmp(num1, num2, std::equal_to<int>()); }
00118 bool operator!=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00119     return cmp(num1, num2, std::not_equal_to<int>()); }
00120 bool operator<(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00121     return cmp(num1, num2, std::less<int>()); }
00122 bool operator>(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00123     return cmp(num1, num2, std::greater<int>()); }
00124 bool operator<=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00125     return cmp(num1, num2, std::less_equal<int>()); }
00126 bool operator>=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00127     return cmp(num1, num2, std::greater_equal<int>()); }
